TopicTitle: DOES ANYONE KNOW GOOD MODS FOR KIS?

Articles.Content:
I wnat some working mods that use kerbal inventory system  1.12.3

Edited May 26, 2022 by THE_KERBAL
unlike the stock inventory system, kis works with every part, stock or modded, so i suggest some colonization mods that are designed to be built on-site such as wbi pathfinder (by angel-125).
there are several. Kerbal Hacks has several. I need to finish updating them and publish the new releases.
